# settings

**Instance Property**

The settings that describe the format of the recorded audio.

## Declaration

```swift
var settings: [String : Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioRecorder/init(url:settings:)] for supported keys and values.

## Inspecting the audio data

- **url**: The URL to which the recorder writes its data.
- **format**: The format of the recorded audio.
